title: ‘12 Years a Slave’ Writer John Ridley to Direct L.A. Riots Drama
text:
‘12 Years a Slave’ Writer John Ridley to Direct L.A. Riots Drama 
Published By: Slashfilm.com - Today 
John Ridley is turning his attention to another unhappy chapter in American history. The Oscar-winning 12 Years a Slave screenwriter will w...
